channel.title: Pages on Quiqr
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Quiqr

item.title: Community
Download
item.description: Quiqr is available for Mac, Windows and Linux. Here are the latest installers. Quiqr for Mac Open the disk image and copy the Quiqr app to your Applications folder. Quiqr for Windows After download execute the .exe-file to install Quiqr. Quiqr for Linux Quiqr for Linux AppImage Quiqr for Linux Deb Quiqr for Linux RPM You can also find Quiqr in Snapcraft Store.

item.title: hugoconf
item.description: Quiqr went public at the Hugo Conf 2022. We want to thanks the people of the HugoConf for giving us time and space to promote our project. The slides of the Pim’s Lightning Talk Pim are available for reading back and you can download these slides as Quiqr Template too.

item.title: Screenshots
item.description: Quiqr looks like this… ready to use templates import Quiqr templates or Hugo Themes powerful CMS multiple sync targets, e.g. publish to GitHub Pages
